website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a fun roller coaster ride on for your little one, but find the dips or price of our Best of the Best a bit too steep, this simpler version is a popular alternative.
pros: Generous length with gentle dips and hills offer a fun “roller coaster” ride for kids between the ages of 2 and 5
Max weight capacity accommodates kids weighing under 50 pounds
Bike-style ride-on features footrests and a handlebar for safety, and can even be used without the track for everyday cruising
Easy for kids to push back up
Wheel wells keep it in place while little ones use the side steps to climb on
cons: Long track takes up a lot of space
We’d prefer a higher backrest to better support smaller kids

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren. Fun for a 19 mo old and an almost 8 yr old. Worth every dollar! Keep the box too!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great, but holds water
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few weeks ago. My kid loves this, but my only complaint is that the middle section holds tons of water. We live in the Pacific Northwest and the rainy season just started, so it has been quite a hassle to empty it all the time when we go out. Would have been nice if there was a small hole for drainage. We will probably drill one soon to keep this from being an ongoing issue because it's a great toy other than that!
customer_reviews.author: Kdmalkmus

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price, keeps kids entertained
customer_reviews.text: My girls, who are about to turn 4 and 2, both love this. My 2 year old loved going down our little slide over and over again, so I thought it'd be worth giving her something a little more substantial to play with. They ride this almost every night for 20 - 30 minutes and have a lot of fun. They can both ride it and bring it back up easily by themselves. To keep themselves intrigued, they go backwards, sideways, put toys on the track to run over, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this product
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for almost a year! It’s an outside toy in my home in constant sun and has held up very well from sun there is no color fading and it’s held up in rain as well! Kids love this product! If your thinking of getting one it’s worth the purchase! My daughter had just turned 2 when I bought it but my 7-9 yr olds still play on it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Derek nelson

customer_reviews.title: CANT RETURN IT and Wheels don’t turn easily so doesn’t roll very far
customer_reviews.text: We tried this at a play place and loved it. However the one we received, the wheels don’t turn very easily so once my kids go down the track, the little car just stops rolling. It was very anticlimactic and they were bored with it in minutes. Worst part is you can’t return it. Don’t order from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Favali

customer_reviews.title: Received used, defective toy
customer_reviews.text: For $100 the toy should be NEW and work perfectly. When I took it out of the box I could see scuff marks already on some of the parts. The little car's wheels barely turned at all they were so tight and stuck. How can they ship something like this out???
customer_reviews.author: K. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Son’s favorite toy! More versatile than you think.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a huge hit in my house. We have it set up in our finished basement for the time being since it has been too cold to play outside, and my 18-month-old wants to go down every chance he gets. He not only rides the little car down the ramp, but he also loves pushing the car down by itself, rolling down his toy cars and balls, sitting on his bum and sliding down the dips, and crawling back up the ramp (all with my help/supervision, of course). I never imagined it could have so many uses!! This thing was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: HollyBrooke

customer_reviews.title: As seen in your neighbors yard.
customer_reviews.text: We finally bit the bullet and bought this roller coaster which is great for our three-year-olds (twins) and also for our eight-year-old, although the latter cohort is more likely to do something stupid with it, i.e., go down backwards or headfirst diving position, terminating in mudpile. Regardless, this is a well-worth purchase and super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts?
customer_reviews.text: We received the product and it is missing BOTH of the stairs that attach to the coaster. 15 month old daughter loves it, but having to lift the her up every time for a ride until makes it a real pain to use. Going to wait until we get a response regarding the missing set of steps before i build my own set of steps... Have to go through manufacturer for the new pieces... Will update review IF and WHEN this gets rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 1. 5 enjoys this! I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 enjoys this! I bought this so we could have our own. I would take her to a program where they have toys for kids to play with and this is one of her favorites but there’s so many kids so she can’t always play with it. Now she doesn’t have to wait on rotation and have her turn anytime she likes. My only con is wishing the front part of the wheel has wider part where it’s easier to rest her feet
customer_reviews.author: Athena Hipolito

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Our son is 15 months old and just loves this. At his age he gets the most fun out of just pushing the car down the ramp, but he also enjoys riding. Setup couldn't be simpler. The ride is safe but fun. He isn't old enough to climb onto it by himself, so we place him on the car and get it going. Or, I just put the car on the ramp and he runs over excitely to push it down.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the BEST purchases for the kiddos!! I bought it with my 3yr old in mind but my 1yr old, 9yr old (over 120lbs) and his friends LOVE this thing! I bought this rollercoaster because we've had a long ugly winter and the kids get a little stir crazy from being inside. I really recommend this! With the summer soon approaching the kids will be able to enjoy this outside.
customer_reviews.author: RiRi

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun! Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I give this plastic roller coaster 5 out of 5 stars. .. Two year old grandson is obsessed with it.. The hundred dollar tag is a little costly for something made of plastic i thought.... But that all went away after seeing my grandsons extreme joy... I'm 200lbs and put my full weight on this.. it's very sturdy! my daughter weighs over 100 and she was using this also having an awesome time.. Buy it, you'll not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely easy to piece together , the car comes fully assembled. All you do is click the pieces on , no screws, or nails. My son absolutely loves it. It’s more of an outdoor toy but we got it for him for Christmas and we keep it in our living room as it’s snowing outside. He’s only 1 , but he can use it perfectly. He knows how to put the car back and push himself down. Although I would recommend more for 2-3 year olds as he has fallen once or twice. (With no injury) it keeps him busy and he is so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Demmon

customer_reviews.title: This is Really Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 5 year old girls love playing on this. We play with it in our living room and put it back in the box when we are done. We let one at a time go down then they get to push it back in place and take turns nicely. Keeps the fighting down. This would make a great gift for any occasion and can be used indoors and outdoors. The car is pretty secure in its loading station so you don't have to worry about them falling off the track. They have a ton of fun with this. We recommend this -Five Stars
customer_reviews.author: sweetdream2001

customer_reviews.title: Bent & Wont Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest toy to assemble, unless it comes damaged. Unfortunately one of the ramps, which connects to another ramp, is bent. Hopefully I can knock it out with a hammer, but if not, this outdoor toy is useless. I am assuming it got damaged during shipment, which is very disappointing. Update: a hammer did absolutely no good! The mode ramp is bent in several spots, and it wont assemble. Luckily I cant return it either *insert sarcasm*. Money down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too slow for a wild child
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter,,19 months old, who apparently, is more of a dare devil than I anticipated. At first she seemed unsure of taking a ride but after the second time down she was no longer interested in it. Her 9 year old sister has more interest in it than she does. I am waiting now for my 4 year old grandson to try it and hope he takes an interest in it. I think if it was a little faster she would have more fun. The ride is over way too soon for her. I would not purchase this again, but not all children love the thrill of the ride as much as this toddler.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers have had so much fun on this roller coaster, and we have had so much fun watching them and helping them (helping our one year old; our 3 year old just does it all herself!)! Lots of enjoyment with this. Weather was bad when we got it, so we just set it up in our den and the kids just played and played on it. Weather is better now, so we very easily moved it outside! A great investment in fun for our little ones (and their friends)!
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Durable, safe, hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun and very lightweight and easy to move about. Pieces slide in together so no screws/bolts, etc. Durable and the perfect size for 2 and 3 year olds ... can easily see it being used for the next few years as well. The ability to buy a second car is the only thing we could see improvement with. Thanks Step 2.
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Go this for my 13 month old granddaughter... she loves it, big 'ol smile when she rides it. My 6 yr old granddaughter loves it as well. She's a small girl and is within the weight limit but her legs stick out, lol. I wish there were a way to add on and raise the track as the child grows, but it's enjoyable for both from 13 months to 6 years, so I guess that's good enough! Definitely a unique and fun gift.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Buy one. Months later and they are still playing with it daily. Bought two of these for Christmas presents. Set of twin boys in one home, and three little ones at other. They use it ALL the time. Crawl all over it, send toys up and down. Such fun and it is September and they are still playing on it everyday. Easy to set up,...
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's second birthday and he LOVES it! I feel that it's a pretty awesome product, considering that all you have to do to set it up is click all the pieces together. No hassle with tools or anything. And when you need to put it away, it makes for super easy clean up and storage. I love watching him play on it. Was definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rollercoaster for indoor or outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loved going down a similar rollercoaster at daycare. He seemed to be on it all the time, so it seemed a no-brainer to get one for at home. Of course, it takes up a fair amount of room. But, we have space for it in our basement playroom or it can be taken outside. It is sturdy but lightweight enough if it needs to be moved. The only downside seems to be the speed - the one at daycare is faster, but that is likely due to the fact that it gets a lot more use and the wheels spin more freely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9 years and on the 3rd family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 9 years ago and used it a few years. Gave it to a co-worker who used it for grandkids. They gave it to another couple who still use it. All use it indoors and the kids aren't too rough and it has definitely lived longer than I thought it would. Kinda bulky but we just stored it under a bed and the car and tallest section just sat in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! My almost two year old world it by herself. She and the 11 year old have been riding non stop.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Going To Be So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are going to absolutely love this roller coaster! They're getting it for Christmas! It came in a big box! I'm thankful it didn't have what was in the inside, on the outside of the box. My grandson said; "grandma we got big mail today, what's inside"? My reply was; "It's something you and your brothers are going to enjoy, especially during the winter months"! It was given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: All ages of children seem to love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one we have purchased for three different grandchildren. The first one is still in working order after 14 years! I noticed at outdoor birthday parties all of the kids went straight for it no matter what their age! It can be left out year round although it will eventually fade somewhat. I would say it is pretty indestructible and children love it!
customer_reviews.author: Loving Florida!

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly! This thing is AMAZING! While being assembled to surprise our son for his birthday my fairly large 26year old husband, my average weight and height 30year old friend and my short and stocky 25 year old self had SO MUCH FUN riding it and playing on it. The kid enjoyed it as well but not as much as we did. It’s worth the money and it takes all of 8 minutes to assemble. The hardest part is getting it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Cain

customer_reviews.title: The best gift I have ever bought for my kids.
customer_reviews.text: They have been playing on this toy (in doors) for hours a day since we got it. They absolutely love it. We have gotten our moneys value out of it already. The quality is great, and it is easy to disassemble. I will be giving these out as birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a joint gift for Easter for my 2 and 3 year old boys. 6 total pieces (including the car) that just slide together for the worlds easiest assembly. My children could put this together. This gives them hours and hours of fun outdoors! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal b.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son plays all different ways with this coaster. We bought it for him when he was 16 months and now at 18 months he’s a pro. Can get up and down on it fine and will even ride down backwards. Gets frustrated sometimes pushing it back up and getting it on the tracks, but that’s to be expected so young. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Craighead

customer_reviews.title: Kids of all ages will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday. She absolutely loves it! And so does her brother who is almost 5. It will entertain them for quite a while, which is great for this mom! It's very sturdy and well made. The handle on the front of the cart is a little crooked, but I can live with that. We haven't tried it outside or on carpet yet, just on our hardwood floor. I felt the price was a little high, but still feel like it's worth it to entertain my kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Noelleaopi

customer_reviews.title: So far...soo great
customer_reviews.text: We just got this an hour ago... Took 2 minutes to put together and my almost 3 year old granddaughter hasn't gotten off it. Shes able to return car to starting position on her own and its low to the ground so no danger in injurying herself. I have never bought another toy that has held her interest like this
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kids! Small and big!
customer_reviews.text: This is just so fun! I bought this for the kids and they can ride this 100 times!!!! Is very simple to assemble and it don’t really take much space to storage... we keep it inside of the house but I have neighbors that have this outside it it seems to last for years! Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Best 2nd birthday gift ever!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his roller coaster!!!!! Easy to assemble The kids intuitively know how to use it (so they tire themselves out) It's safe but most importantly they love it! 2 yr old son has his cousins over aged 4 and 7 and the roller coaster was dominated by the older kids who couldn't stop laughing and using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mellow yellow

customer_reviews.title: Great, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth it, got it for birthday gift and all the kids had a blast playing in it. Then we took it apart and headed home with it. It’s big but easy to take apart and out together. So much fun for kids who want to go but can’t quite handle a big bike. Also great for being stuck inside all winter haha.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Somers

customer_reviews.title: Absolute joy for everyone
customer_reviews.text: So happy this was a birthday gift for my 2 year old and she loves it. It’s perfect gift she absolutely loves it and I got it so quickly. Sellers are amazing and responds quickly. Highly recommended! Makes me so happy to see how much she loves it. The roller coaster is durable and very easy to put together. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ya

customer_reviews.title: great toys for kids
customer_reviews.text: My two little children loved it so much that they fell over each other to get on this little train... I tried the following that day, although I was 99lbs, I did not break down... It's of good quality. By the way, my dog likes to play too, haha
customer_reviews.author: Arthur S

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a family must-have hands down. Save up some money if you need to, put it on a credit card, whatever you gotta do and invest in one of these. Probably too big for a small apartment, but you can set it up at the park! Very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Vallee Gurrl

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride for toddlers and young kids
customer_reviews.text: What a great toy! Just long enough for a fun ride for an 18 mo old boy and 4 year old girl. It snaps together in minutes and the car is safe from tipping. It's better and longer than the ones we've seen in local toy departments. We've set it up outside on the lawn as well as in the family room and the kids have had a great time in both locations.
customer_reviews.author: Susfull

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our two year old who has lots of fun on it. The edges along the track keep the car in place when in motion. The steps on the side allow for a safe climb up and onto the car while holding onto the cross bar on the car for stability while climbing on. Very safe. Also have other STEP 2 play equipment and it seems very safe. Loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fast assembly. Sturdy and fun. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My active 1 year old can't get enough. With supervision and direction in two days he can safely climb stairs, get on and off the car. He pushes it back up the ramp but still needs help if it gets off track. Will be used indoors and out doors. I put cardboard blocks to stop/slowdown car makes knocking them down added fun.😁🤣🤗
customer_reviews.author: Cucumbers

customer_reviews.title: FUN AND STURDY TOY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roller coaster for my two granddaughters and was extremely pleased. I then bought another one for my grandson. Both coasters are still in perfect condition. I am 70 years old and have no problem assembling or moving the coasters. However, the children do insist that someone interact with them as they roll and play...
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Best. Gift. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever!!! Got this for my two year old for his birthday.. I was so stressed about it! Is it safe? Can he do it on his own? Will he be entertained? Yes! Yes! Yes! As I’m writing this he’s been playing with it for 2.5 hours and is still having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gies

customer_reviews.title: This was my grandson's favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Since my grandson lives half a country away from where I live, I had this item sent directly to his house, where my daughter and son-in-law assembled this "roller coaster" for him to find Christmas morning. He loves it and my daughter told me it was well constructed and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: lilymoon

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: WOOHOO! This made such a big hit christmas morning! I bought it for my grandson who rode it over and over again! It took a few minutes for hime to figure out how to push it up the slide by himself ( he's 2), but then he was unstoppable! It was nice that no assembly was required for the car. It does take just a few seconds to snap each of the track pieces together, but really simple. My grandson loves the ramp even with out the car! Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: zdemoguy

customer_reviews.title: Geandkids Love it
customer_reviews.text: This comes in several pieces for easy storage. Gift to a 2 yr old, but the 4 yr old loves it, too. Easy for them to use, although the steps up could be a bit deeper. The littleone has fun moving truck on the track even without sitting on it. Each piece slides safely into other(s), so very safe. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bubbe barbara

customer_reviews.title: Fun  fun fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren absolutely loved this! It was the absolute hit of Christmas. They are two and three years old and their cousins who are five and six also very much enjoyed it. I just wish that it had a carrying case to store it in. I had to put it back in the box to store it.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaLee

customer_reviews.title: Up and Down Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun and durable product for our 20 month old granddaughter. Once assembled she was able to take her little car up and down to the top and ride it down on her own. Great fun whether indoors or out to keep them busy and let the parents catch a breath!
customer_reviews.author: BAMAPAT

customer_reviews.title: Best toy we have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Words can’t describe how awesome this toy is for kids. My 2 year old grandson loves this so much. We use it indoors because it’s winter but plan on putting this outside in the summer. It breaks down easy and quickly for storage but even my petite 11 year old plays on this. Worth the price! This will be one of your kids favorite toys - trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Momnurse

customer_reviews.title: Fun for wide range of ages!
customer_reviews.text: My boys received this for Chirstmas and absolutely love it. Very easy to put together and they were taking turns riding it within moments of assembly. Even though its long, it actually doesn't take up much space. My 5 yr old likes it just as much as the 20 month old!
customer_reviews.author: Eva M

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a much loved toy at our house - our daughter under 2yo is a daredevil and loves riding it. Our 5yo son enjoys it too. I wish I had purchased this when my son was little. A great toy - keeps kids busy when outdoor play isn't an option. Our youngest eventually learned to reset the car so no adult help is required to operate - YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L. Hammann

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good about this toy. I bought this for my Grandson turning 1 even though it says for 2+ My other 3 grandkids were playing on it even my 1 year old grandson with a little help. The smiles on the faces of them are priceless...... even thinking about buying....DO IT!!!! You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Jo Jazudek

customer_reviews.title: Great playtime
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson's 2nd birthday. He really loves this toy. It only took him three times showing him how to set the car on the track for him to start pushing the car up and setting it on the track himself. He will go out in the yard and play with it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids (4 years and 1.5 years) love this. It's made well. A little hard to connect the sections but it should be to keep it from not separating. Surprisingly my 1.5 yr old uses this by herself and loves it. Great toy that will be hopefully used for a long time
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Hours of laughs
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this toy. She would ride it all day if we let her. Most adults who visit insist on taking it for a ride as well. It holds up extremely well. The quickest Christmas present we ever had to put together. It’s awesome that it’s indoor/outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Best addition to the play room yet!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a great call, the kids love it! With the rainy days we have bee having, its been used constantly. It is somewhat light weight and easy to piece together. I suggest saving the box it came in for storage if you don't plan on making it a permanent fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, fun & easy for toddler to use on their own.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, fun & easy for toddlers to use on their own after you show them a few times. Got this for our son’s 2nd birthday and he uses it all the time. We have it in his playroom but you could also put this outside. I was initially hesitant due to the cost but it ended up being worth it for the amount of use it gets and how sturdy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K. Brooker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome roller coaster!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at our early xmas party. Every kid liked it so much and some of the adults just had to try it out! I can see how this would even be a good inside toy throughout a long winter, if you have the room for it! Because it will entertain, no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Cabingirlat44

customer_reviews.title: A multi experience hit
customer_reviews.text: Great hit at Christmas for 1 year old and 3+. Young grandson loved pushing the car down the slide. Was brave enough to ride a couple of times. Older sister loved the ride when little bro allowed her an opening to ride. It is large but our son was able to set it up diagonally across the playroom so the grandkids could enjoy it on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Browndavis

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Company was SO QUICK & EFFICIENT when I wanted to know if it would be here before my son's birthday, which was a middle delivery date! Absolutely so great to work with and support companies like this! 100% amazing and my son hasn't stopped playing with it since he got it! So worth the price and I believe its durable enough to last for some years if properly taken care of!
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great activity. Great "toy". My 11 y.o. grandson wants one!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is fantastic. My 20 m.o. granddaughter has loved it since we took it out of box. Uses all day. Very safe and well made. Ordered 2 in error and have had trouble returning 2nd one. At first they said not returnable but I finally got a return # today. Credit remains to he seen.....last chapter remains.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a Xmas gift, got one for each grandson. But when it arrived my daughters couldn’t wait and put them to use. Easy assembly and the kids won’t get off. The only problem is that my granddaughter wanted one too. The 18 mo and two year old have no problem pushing the cars up the track and using the side stairs to mount
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I wish it came in adult size
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast delivery, super easy to put together, and in perfect condition. My 3 year old loves it, he rides for an hour straight before he wants to stop. Definitely worth the money and super durable. This thing will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Farnham

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVE this! I don't think there is a way ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE this! I don't think there is a way to go wrong with this purchase. My son is about 55lbs and rides on this with his sister who is 20lbs and the little car still moves pretty quickly. They use this a lot! It is very sturdy we don't seem to have an issue with it moving around even with my son on it. I am very happy with this purchase and so are my children.
customer_reviews.author: Starzx510

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to assemble, fun! Made in USA- very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality toy. Love that it is made in the USA It came very quick and had great customer service, They responded quickly after I sent an email. We will probably order again next year for my nephew Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Wheels won't turn, waste of money. Son was so disappointed for his birthday. No clue how this is 5 star rated.
customer_reviews.author: kurrier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fun
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers LOVE this toy. We have it set up in our basement and it has been awesome for the winter for a way to get their energy out. The set up for super easy and we have even been able to take it apart and take it to my parent's house for a party. The car came put together, so they only set up for us was to connect the four pieces together which was a snap. We've had it for a month and it's already paid for it self with the amount we have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Indoors & out!  Age 2-10!
customer_reviews.text: Kids from 2-10 have played with this many many times now & all of them seem to have a blast! It’s a huge centerpiece for play dates. We’ve used it outside mostly, but now have it inside & it works great indoors, too. Easy to breakdown & setup. Super quick. Kids ages 7-10 have carried it outside in pieces & set it up on their own. We all love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: J and S

customer_reviews.title: A toy for the years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this roller coaster ride on for my nephew about 6 years ago when he was 2 or 3. He loved it so much and used it still until just recently. When I found it on sale I had to get it for my son. My 2 year old loves this toy. Even just walking up and down it or sliding on his bottom down it or sending trucks down it. It's so easy to assemble and move around as needed. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Huge win!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3yr old daughter loves this! I was initially disappointed that the yellow section came cracked (I reached out to the seller with no reply) but it hasn't made any issues so far...hopefully it stays that way!
customer_reviews.author: DS AA

customer_reviews.title: Son’s Favorite Toy Ever
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely LOVES this. He’ll be in his playroom for 30 minutes straight playing with this toy. He never gets bored of it. I will definitely purchase another one for the baby I’ll be having soon!
customer_reviews.author: GabbieM

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite for our 20 Month Old
customer_reviews.text: If you’re anything like us, almost any toy that will hold a toddler’s focus and keep him occupied for 20+ minutes is a five star product. We bought this rollercoaster for our son when he was 18 months old and he figured out how to use it and even reset the carriage on the top of the track almost immediately. He LOVES this coaster and we do too. Used indoor for a few days and then moved it outside on the yard: rolls fine for a few feet on the grass. Rain/dew does collect in the dip, so good to have a towel on hand for regular outdoor use!
customer_reviews.author: Craig and Laura W

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing. My 2 & 3 year old cannot get ...
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS IMMEDIATELY! It's amazing. My 2 & 3 year old cannot get enough of it. They ride on it alone, together, with their toys, they push cars down the ramp- one of our best purchases for sure. I just wish it was longer or there was pieces you could buy to add on and make it longer- but they absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Styled237

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't roll well on it's own, requires pushing. Requires force for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces was hard to get into place, due to it being wider than the slots. It took significant force - I imagine it will be difficult to disassemble now. The car doesn't go down the track well on its own (with the kid on it), it gets stuck at the first hill. We have to push it to get our kid to make it to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Boeckman

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old was ecstatic to get it!!! We have played with it all evening... on and off the tracks..... we also like to climb the tracks, and roll other cars off of it too... definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: tucksMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Amusement park ride at home.
customer_reviews.text: This little roller coaster is amazing. It is small enough to keep in the house in the winter, and enjoyable enough outside during the summer. My two year old grandson loves it. He is now 27 months and acts like a big shot holding his hands over his head when he rides it now. He also loves to push the card back up the coaster and send it down with no one on it. It is very durable, made with a very heavy plastic, comes apart so it is completely portable.
customer_reviews.author: mmuncci

customer_reviews.title: Encourages physical activity
customer_reviews.text: Best toy we've ever bought for our 5 year old granddaughter and 2 year old grandson. We set this up in the living room during their visits. Yes, they ride the included roller coaster car down the ramp, in every possible way, and love to push the car back up the ramp. But they also use it as a track for matchbox cars, trains, balls, and tractors. They run up and down the ramp, jump off the sides, and even slide down on their bellies. So silly and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Britt A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy toy for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 and 4 year old and they love it. While all kids eventually lose interests in a toy, my kids have kept at it with this one. It's easy to assemble and the box left over is a great play toy as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Rosone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Kid absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and my 2 year old loves it. It is 6 pieces, that's it. Its incredibly easy to move around or pack up and put away. My little one has a blast riding the cart down the track. If you want something that is fun and thrilling for that special little person in your life, this would be a great gift! I'd recommend over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Lange

customer_reviews.title: Cute but takes up a bit of room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kiddo when he turned 1. He's 3 now and still plays with it on occasion. It's great quality, been thought many play dates and kids. Super cute and fun. It's kind of big, so you'll need a decent sized area to play. Once the car reaches the end of the track, it keeps going. Very happy with this and it has lasted quite a long time for us
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up for lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: 5 easy pieces to make the the track and steps. Car is already assembled. Grandchild loves to ride it and is able to push it back up to the start position easily. Right now using it on a wooden floor in the hallway. Will be good for outdoor when the weather warms.
customer_reviews.author: Another Citizen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old LOVES this toy!!! Such a HUGE hit for Christmas! He can get on/off by himself and can push the car back onto the ramp without any help. He just needs supervision and a slight push to get going. This was a great buy! I think we’ll enjoy it for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin David

customer_reviews.title: Great item, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The actual set is awesome! My girls (2 and 5) LOVE IT. The item came in a box that was torn to shreds, our mail guy literally handed us the pieces separate from the box because the box was so torn up. The sticker on the front of the car is damaged but doesn’t change how the set works. The set is 5 stars but the items damage / packaging make me only rate the item as a 4.
customer_reviews.author: es78692

customer_reviews.title: STURDY FUN FOR TODDLERS
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE COLORS AND THE TOUGH, STURDY MATERIALS IT IS MADE FROM. IT IS EASY TO SET UP AND READY FOR USE IN 5 MINUTES! A GREAT VALUE WITH DURABILITY FOR THE LONG HAUL. a GREAT GIFT FOR ANY CHILD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy  v

customer_reviews.title: FUN, FUN, FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast for kids! We got it for our son's 2nd birthday party. He was the youngest on it, so the age range was 2-5yrs. They LOVED it. It's actually pretty safe, meaning the kids cannot steer it off or jump the tracks as they're riding down it. I saw someone else's review that it's more of a 10-15min type of entertainment and that's true when our son is playing alone. When there was a group of kids, they all played for a couple of hours. If you have a 2yr year old and you're on the fence, just get it!
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great present! I bought it for my twin toddler, but my 7 and 6 year olds love it just as much. It’s very sturdy. We’ve had it a couple of weeks, and I’ve probably already gotten my money’s worth!
customer_reviews.author: H P

customer_reviews.title: They love it but want more of a ride.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this!!! Super easy to assemble and disassemble to use them move. It just needs to be 2 track sections longer... or provide the ability to add additional track sections.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: From the first time my 18 month old grandson rode this, he laughed and giggled and kept asking for more. After just a few days, he can bring the scooter back to the beginning and get on himself. Such a cute toy!!!! Prepping him for future coasters 😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: stressedma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids all LOVE this. When my older two were younger, our neighbors at the time had one and it just never got old. When we had our third child, and neighbors moved (with their coaster), I knew it would be the perfect addition. Kids are currently 6, 4, 1 and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old daughter for Christmas. It was super easy to assemble. Her brothers also enjoy it just as much as she does (Ages 5 & 7). It's stored in our basement. Had it for 5 months now and still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kayt

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I literally put this together in 30 seconds , my two yr old wanted this after seeing it featured in one of BLIPPI’s videos . My 2&4 yr olds LOVE this !
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Have had for about a year and had to buy two more coasters for my other grandchildren because they enjoy it so much. Easy to assemble. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo LOVES this toy! She rides on it probably about 10-20 minutes every day. We're even able to use it as a bribe ("If you take a nap, when you wake up, you can ride on your roller coaster.") It's a fairy decent size - my husband and I can each uncomfortably ride it. The only downside to this toy is that it's pretty bulky and needs a lot of space, even when you are just storing it. It has great resale value though at the local yard sales.
customer_reviews.author: BubblyMimosa

customer_reviews.title: Best. Toy. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite thing I’ve ever gotten my kids they will play on the roller coaster for hours. If you’re on the fence about buying it I highly recommmend. Easy to put together and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kdg0311

customer_reviews.title: Fun but got bored with it quick
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. My kids loved it for the first day or two now it gets played with once a day maybe. Takes up a lot of space for not being used as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: its a bit less fun than the videos, but still pretty fun
customer_reviews.text: my 2yo daughter is having fun with this roller coaster. She isn't addicted to it, but will casually take 1 ride every other day or so. she has a big smile when she does it so i assume she is happy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Godson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Godson’s 2nd bday and tried it out at the party! It was FUN and he (and I) loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Can you say too much fun? This roller coaster is the first thing my nephew asks for when he comes over. He LOVES this thing! It's a great bargin for the price because kids use it constantly. The can also use the roller coaster for their own hot wheel cars as ramps and the ride on can be used separately. We keep it inside but this can easily be used outside as well. Only drawback is it takes up allot of space when storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna G

customer_reviews.title: Fun!  Kid just needs a good push to go fast.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, 5 stars on the assembly! Pulled it out of the box and took about twenty seconds to set up! My 3 year old can put the car up there and ride down on his own. The only reason I give it a 4 star instead of 5 is that if he wants to go fast and a long way an adult has to give him a pretty good push.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ettleman

product_meta.title: Step2 Up & Down Roller Coaster Ride On
product_meta.description:
It may not feature any loop-de-loops or terrifying hairpin turns, but preschoolers will likely find this 10-foot-long roller coaster every bit as thrilling as grownups find the amusement park version. Molded in brightly colored plastic, it's built for years of wear in either the backyard or the playroom. The set's components fit together to form a downhill ride with another smaller hill about halfway through. What we loved most about this set is the fact that the individual parts are just as much fun as the fully assembled kit. The car, bright yellow with a sturdy handle, could just as easily be used around the house if the child is too young for the coaster. And the ramp system is plenty of fun to roll cars, balls, or anything else. Perhaps our tiny toy tester said it best: 'Wheee!'.

AMAZON.COM
It may not feature any loop-de-loops or terrifying hairpin turns, but preschoolers will likely find this 10-foot-long roller coaster every bit as thrilling as grownups find the amusement park version. Molded in brightly colored plastic, it's built for years of wear in either the backyard or the playroom. The set's components fit together to form a downhill ride with another smaller hill about halfway through. What we loved most about this set is the fact that the individual parts are just as much fun as the fully assembled kit. The car, bright yellow with a sturdy handle, could just as easily be used around the house if the child is too young for the coaster. And the ramp system is plenty of fun to roll cars, balls, or anything else. Perhaps our tiny toy tester said it best: "Wheee!" --John Moe

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This award-winning roller coaster is a Step2 favorite. With non-slip steps and snap-together construction, amusement-park fun lives in your play room or back yard.

See more
feature_bullets: Features a 10-foot long roller coaster ride on track, built for years of play outdoors or in the playroom
2 non-slip steps lock securely into the 3 piece riding track for access from both sides
Specially designed track holds the car in position while your little one climbs aboard.Maximum weight limit car can hold: 50 lbs (22.7 kg)
Riding car has high back, handrail, and foot rests for riding securely down the track
Car track assembles easily by snapping together(no tools required).Play Tip: Use the car alone as a riding toy
